name: Loot Build
description:
*Downloadable game coming / if people are interested!*

Fight against a self-learning Artificial Intelligence and climb the ranks to show you can out play code itself! Collect trophies from the spoils of war to unlock 25 unique troops as you travel through time, starting in the caveman era to beyond the galaxy! 

Build your base with exciting defences to bring your all, against an enemy that learns your every move! Every time you attack, the AI will continuously fortify their base to the way you play, so change your tactics frequently for a chance of victory!

Including a global high-score where you can show off your progress  and Invite other players to fight among you, as you team together and calculate the best strategy!

New updates will come at random with new troops, arenas and other features!

Thanks to Existential Games for the intensive work of creating the majority of the troops and Neotreesink for the epic background music!
